channel.title: New Features & Releases on
channel.description: Recent content in New Features & Releases on

item.title: SeaMeet Release History
item.description: 5/15/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Updated audio player UI. Added the “Download Transcript” button to the audio player bar. Fixed an issue where adding a viewer to the list didn’t trigger a notification email. Fixed a bug where disabled workspaces were still shown in the extension. Fixed an issue where free plan users couldn’t retry diarization after an audio upload failed. Shortened the signup and onboarding flow. 5/8/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Fixed an issue where some meetings incorrectly showed audio file does not exist.
